item.title: I was false banned
item.author: invalid@example.com (Sneakylittleman)
item.dc:creator: Sneakylittleman
item.content:encoded: Hi, I just got banned a few minutes ago for using a hacked client. First of all, I'm using the lunar client (not a hacked client), second what happened was I lagged while trying to telly bridge, my first bridge didn't disappear so I ran on it to get to the end, then it counted 2 seconds. Hopefully, a mod/admin sees this and unban me.

item.title: How Am I Banned From Bridger.Land Discord Without Even Joining
item.author: invalid@example.com (burbars)
item.dc:creator: burbars
item.content:encoded:
I when bedless was abt to release his 400K pack I went to go get it at bridger.land discord but in reality I couldn't because I was banned from it.
Mind you this I used bedless' to get the pack and join the server but I was banned from it. I asked some people from bedless nation and they said theirs was just fine. I sent the link to a friend and it said This User Is Banned and that's when I realized I was banned. I asked some people if they had staff and they didnt have it. I went to ban...

Read more

item.title: Question for people with bloody abedless
item.author: invalid@example.com (R3al_)
item.dc:creator: R3al_
item.content:encoded:
So just got my abedless and I'm wondering if anyone who has one has had its texture ware off. i have been told its texture will wear off in like a week and I'm nervous to even use the mouse cus i don't want to "ruin it". so after teh texture wears off will the mouse be ruined or can i still drag on it decently but not as well (please compare to a70 (i also have a70 so did I waste money on abedless?) Also with the a70 should i put tape on it?

Thank you for reading and potentially answering...
